name: Football Penalty Kicks Stars
description:
No doubt, Soccer is the No 1 Sports in all over the world. Beat the challenge while throwing the football into the goal. You have to goal on every penalty to prove you the best striker of this favorite game. Play like a best kicker and favorite forward player. Score and win your sports man battle. Just swipe and hit the ball on score destination. Flick the ball to the goal and score to win the game. Penalty are provided to the both teams in football final rounds when both teams have the same goal score. You are the score kicks star and try to score on every penalty. It’s time to play soccer and shootout the penalty on football goal point.
World best addictive sports is football, you can be a best footballer while scoring on these penalty kicks stars strike. A chance to impress the opponent’s goalkeeper while hitting in the goal point. Hit on target and show your coach with the best penalty strikes. Hit on proper place and achieve your reward with extra time to hitting on the time plate. Swipe and flick to the goal to score for your country. Shoot the penalty ball to beat in the challenge. Enjoy the best and realistic physics and is definitely for you. Challenge yourself and plan that you will never miss any of the penalty.
You have to score maximum within time and will be given an extra time on exact shoot and proper hitting. Avoid the goalkeeper or obstacle that stop you from scoring the goal. Your aim is to score on every penalty. This is the totally one on one match. This is the final test of your soccer skills as you can play a forward player in the match or not. Create your fantasy of penalty kicks star of this soccer play world. Get extra reward while hitting the time machine hanging on the goal pool?
